mapper.update: UPDATE t_link SET total_uv = CASE WHEN total_uv = 0 THEN 1 ELSE total_uv + #{uvIncrement} END, total_uip = CASE WHEN total_uip = 0 THEN 1 ELSE total_uip + #{uvIncrement} END, total_pv = total_pv + 1 WHERE gid = #{gid} AND short_uri = #{shortUri}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.domain, t.short_uri, t.full_short_uri, t.origin_uri, t.total_pv, t.total_uv, t.total_uip, t.gid, t.enable_status, t.created_type, t.valid_date_type, t.valid_date, t.description, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.del_flag, COALESCE(s.today_pv, 0) AS today_pv, COALESCE(s.today_uv, 0) AS today_uv, COALESCE(s.today_uip, 0) AS today_uip FROM t_link t LEFT JOIN t_link_stats_today s ON t.short_uri = s.short_uri AND s.access_date = #{today} WHERE t.gid = #{gid} AND t.enable_status = 1 AND t.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY ${orderTag} DESC
